body_html:
Would it be possible to have a better control over the exported symbols ? Currently we have a symbol conflict with OpenCV (because of libpng and libjpeg, see #14267).

Could we also work towards having GRPC optional on Linux ? The main issue would be with tensorflow/core/debug/debug_io_utils.h
body_text:
Would it be possible to have a better control over the exported symbols ? Currently we have a symbol conflict with OpenCV (because of libpng and libjpeg, see #14267).
Could we also work towards having GRPC optional on Linux ? The main issue would be with tensorflow/core/debug/debug_io_utils.h
body:
Would it be possible to have a better control over the exported symbols ? Currently we have a symbol conflict with OpenCV (because of libpng and libjpeg, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/14267).

Could we also work towards having GRPC optional on Linux ? The main issue would be with [tensorflow/core/debug/debug_io_utils.h](../blob/master/tensorflow/core/debug/debug_io_utils.cc)
